column1: starts off with a wayward delivery down leg. Thing to note is there's some swing
short of length on off, this one nips back in sharply and Parthiv defends to the leg side
whipped away off his hip to deep square leg

nearly a run-out at the bowler's end. Buttler is lucky. What's more is he'll get four overthrows too. Turns this to short midwicket and sets off for a run, dishes in a full-length dive to get back in.
sliding into middle and leg, Parthiv clips it into the fine leg boundary. Wrong line from Dinda. Too straight, nicely tucked away
gets half-forward and punches the short of length delivery to mid-off
width outside off, flayed on the up to Rahane at cover point
too short and pulled away in front of square. Swivels back and swats that away between midwicket and mid-on
back of length outside off, hint of nip away as well, left alone
walks across the stumps and then uses his steely wrists to whip that behind square on the leg side. No chance for the fielder in the deep
gets forward and bunts the length ball outside off to cover
much better line, length on off, not much room this time, Buttler walks out and blocks
length outside off, defended with soft hands
pulled but straight to square leg
top shot! Dinda errs in length again. Too short outside off, Parthiv rolls his wrists over the delivery and pulls him over midwicket. Imperious
crunched but straight to Rahane at cover point. Missed out. This was overpitched and he timed it sweetly
play and miss. Looks to ease the away-going delivery behind point. Dinda shouts his lungs out but Dhoni hardly reacts
driven on the up past the diving mid-off fielder. Didn't time it as well as he would have liked but it still raced away. On the up, delightful.

dropped! Oh, dear. Bhatia has made a right royal mess of a straightforward chance. Parthiv slashes, the thick edge flies to third man where Bhatia is hit on the stomach as he looked to grab at that. It got to him much faster than he anticipated.
starts off with a length ball on the stumps, dabbed to point for a quick single
walks outside the crease and turns an incoming delivery to the leg side
drags the length back just a little, he mistimes a pull to midwicket
thumped over the long-on boundary. Touch ahead of length, Buttler waits inside the crease and shovels it over the ropes. Intent, execution, all too good

scoops him straight over the keeper, flies over the ropes. Trademark Buttler. Bangs a short of length delivery outside off, Buttler walk outside the line of the delivery and then ramps it over. Wow, exhilarating stuff this
through him. Makes room to go over cover, but the ball nips back in to beat the inside edge
gets outside the line of the stumps and sweeps him with the spin into the deep backward square leg boundary

bowled him round his legs. Typical Tahir sprint to celebrate the wicket. The sponsor logo is nearly ripped off. This is fired full, Parthiv looked to sweep to early, but this one didn't turn much and beat the swing to crash into leg stump. Pune really needed this
quicker one outside off, punched to cover
pushed through quicker on middle and leg, worked to midwicket
drifting into middle and leg, pushed to the man coming in from long-on
short and wide outside off, slashed to third man
change in pace, slower and fuller on middle, pushed to midwicket
digs in a slower bouncer, took ages to get to Buttler who looked to play an upper cut. Nearly played two strokes before it got to him. Beaten in the end
bisects cover and mid-off. Sashays down the pitch and slaps the length delivery into the gap. Don't bother diving

muscular hit! This is Buttler unleashed. Too short, Buttler has all the time in the world to make room and then slap this over cover. Sitting up nicely for him to smack that. He was on one foot when he made contact
length ball on middle and leg, whipped to Tahir at deep square leg
lunges forward and defends a tossed up delivery
drives and gets a thick inside edge to short fine leg. Played outside the line, the ball dipped on him as well

done him with a beauty! This drifts in from length and zips off the track. Rohit's feet went nowhere as he looked to work it to the leg side, missed it completely and saw the sound of ball hitting stumps. Used the angle superbly there, delivered this from wide of the crease
too full outside off, squeezed to long-off

he's on fire. Someone stop him before he runs all the way to Mumbai. This is Buttler walking back. Plays all around a length ball that skids on. Unlucky though as he gets a big inside edge. S Ravi raised the finger even before they completed the appeal.
too full outside off, driven wide of cover as they jog the single
Smith has missed a run-out chance at the bowler's end. Rayudu was miles out. Just pushed it off the frontfoot and took off without looking at his partner
uses the pace to help that down to fine leg
swing and a miss. Length ball outside off, he looked to heave this over long-on but played too early
slow legcutter outside off, dabbed to third man as Rayudu jogs the single

angles a length delivery across the batsman, who bunts it to point. There's a direct hit at the non-striker's end but Rayudu, who had his back to throw, dragged his bat in before the stumps were broken
play and a miss. Gets this to skid across at length
rocks back and pulls a short ball to deep midwicket
gets this to drift away from the left-hander, who waits and then bunts it with an opened bat face to point
this time he's too short and is punished. Rana rocks back and pulls that googly over deep midwicket. Muscular hit
steps out and works the quicker delivery to long-on
slow turn from outside off, punched to long-off
too full on off, wrists it to long-on
whips a length ball to deep midwicket
floated full outside off, pushed to long-off
chops one to point. Looked to cut but didn't have the room
driven firmly to long-off. Stylish but this isn't something Pune would mind too much
chips one over cover but the timing is off, gets it into the gap between long-off and deep cover though and so there's enough time to come back for the second
worked across the line to long-on
fires one in from wide of the crease, looks to sweep but the ball lobs off the pad to short fine leg. Played too early
steps out and works it with the spin to midwicket
slow turn from outside off, he steps out and works it against the turn to wide long-on
googly outside leg, looked for the turn as he anticipated a sweep. Rana went for it but this one was way outside leg
swung away into the gap at deep midwicket and long-on, Tahir runs around and fires a quick throw at the bowler's end but he was well in
drifting down leg, the googly gone wrong again, and Rana sweeps this past short fine leg. Neatly done
leading edge but safe. Looked to work across the line again
as far as return catches go, it can't get simpler than that. Another leg-cutter from Bhatia, looked like Rayudu was looking to go downtown but checks his shot and lobs it back
worked to long-on, off the mark
off-cutter this time, drives and gets a thick inside edge to midwicket
gets a good stride forward and eases one to long-off
lunges forward and defends an away-going slower delivery back to Bhatia
uppish again on the leading edge but just lands short of the bowler
length ball down leg to Dhoni, who fumbles. One extra run. Don't see that often, do we?
sensational shot! Bangs one in on middle, Rana pounces onto it in a jiffy as he pulls him behind square. Swivelled and transferred the body weight back before making contact
floats it full and wide outside off, squeezed to third man
walks outside the crease and forces a full delivery to mid-of for a quick single
slower and fuller on middle and leg, turned to midwicket
uses the pace of the bowler to ease this down to third man
looks to walk across to whip it fine but misses. Was flirting with the wide and gets away with it this time
gets down on one knee and slogs this to the leg side where Stokes sprints 20 yards at least around the ropes from long-on to take it on the bounce
off-cutter outside off, he looks to heave this over the leg side but got nowhere near the pitch of the ball and ended up skewing it to Dhoni, who called early and took it without much fuss.
full toss on middle, worked to long-on
punches a length ball to long-off to get off the mark
nurdles a length ball to midwicket
length ball that skids in and keeps a touch low too, punched to long-on
welcomed to the crease for a new spell with a powerful hit. Too full, Pollard makes room and drills it over his head. Don't try putting your hand out to those.

appeal for lbw, S Ravi had to decide if it was bat or pad first. Replays confirm it was pad first. That was crashing into the stumps. Pollard is lucky. That pitched on off and went on. Dhoni signals for a review jokingly
worked across the line to midwicket
touch short, he rocks back and pulls it into the gap at deep midwicket
goes over cover but didn't get to the pitch. On the bounce to Stokes, who attacked the ball from the ropes
fires one full on the pads, flicked to deep midwicket
hammered past Zampa even before he could react on his followthrough. Once againt too full, drilled. Good luck if you're going to try stopping that.
worked across the line to deep midwicket
picked the googly but didn't get underneath the delivery to generate power off the big swing, heaved straight to Bhatia at deep midwicket.
lunges forward and eases one with the turn to cover
eased with the spin to long-off
low full toss but he powers it down the ground, long-on comes around quickly
thick inside-edge on the drive to deep square. Didn't pick the googly
driven with the spin to long-off
pushed though quicker, this one fizzes from length, pushed to long-off again
gets across the stumps and works the googly to midwicket
one of the flattest hits you'd see for six. Down to the pitch of the ball and boom. Wow, what power. I want that bat. Nonchalance to the core
googly which he somehow manages to keep out. Tahir gets to the ball and fires a flat throw to the stumps, hits Pollard but he didn't even flinch.
thumps a full delivery straight to cover
takes off after punching a length ball straight to cover, would've been gone had Smith hit at the bowler's end
dropped. yorker-length delivery outside off, Pollard looks to squeeze this behind point but gets a healthy edge through to Dhoni who fluffs a low chance to his right.
looks to muscle the pull over long-on but didn't get any power behind the stroke. Bat face turned in his land as it rolled to long-on
fired wide outside off, around the seventh stump. You needed to be Joel Garner to reach that
high full toss, hit hard to long-off
looked to swing this to Mumbai, hit it towards downtown Pune. Thick edge off a slog to the third man boundary
full and wide outside off, hammered to wide long-off where Rahane slides to his left to cut that off

stunner from Mayank at long-on. Flat hit that was dying on him but he did well to attack the ball and put in an instinctive dive to pluck that inches from the ground. Lets out an expletive which I can't type here. Stokes, Dhoni run up to congratulate their mate. Pollard was struggling to time the ball since being hit on the elbow
pushes the length ball outside off to long-off
squeezed into the gap between cover and point, down to Tahir
looks to send a length ball from outside off into orbit but misses
full and straight on middle, Southee tees off like a golfer, connects as the ball smashes into the sightscreen. What muscle
sliced over the cover boundary. This is very poor from Dinda. High full toss outside off, Pandya was down on one knee as he used the width to generate the power on the swing
leg-cutter but lands it at length, Pandya waits and waits and then thumps this over long-off. This was sitting up nicely for him to swing through

MS Dhoni would've been proud of that. Nearest to an helicopter hit. Full and straight on middle from wide of the crease, brings the powerful bottom hand to meet the ball on the full and swing this over long-on
thick edge past MS Dhoni's outstretched hands. Into the third man boundary in a couple of nanoseconds. Flew off the blade.

this is nothing more than a short-arm jab. Clobbered over long-on. Bangs a short of length delivery but Pandya didn't have any room to work with, went through with the pull and picked the bones out of that

fires this full and way outside off, Pandya looks to carve this over point but can't reach. Not sure why Southee wanted strike. Runs all the way down the pitch but Pandya didn't move an inch. Dhoni hurls the throw to Dinda who breaks the bails at the bowler's end. Pandya;s back foot was briefly in the air and he just managed to put it down even as Southee got into the crease at the striker's end. They needed to look at multiple replays to decide who was out. Southee it is eventually, much to Mumbai's relief
full toss which he could've swung anywhere he wanted over the leg side but missed. They somehow sneak in a run even as Dhoni fires a direct hit at the striker's end.
short of a length, angling in, tucks to midwicket and takes off for a very quick single

stays in the crease to this back of a length ball, slight shape away and opens the face of his bat. Gets an outside edge that evades the diving keeper. And there is no first slip, just Buttler who is standing wide. The ball goes between the two
short of a length, sprayed down the leg side
back of a length, outside off, stays in the crease and slaps it hard to sweeper cover
short and wide, no feet from Rahane as he slashes and gets beaten comprehensively
fullish, squeezed out back to the bowler
good length, straightening from middle and leg, opens the face of his bat and steers it to square third man for one
full and outside off, Rahane carves it square of the wicket, plays it close to the body and opens the face of his bat
another outside edge that goes for four. Rahane pushes forward and the ball shapes away late. Gets an outside edge that goes past the slip fielder
short of a length and angling in on the pads, tucked off them to deep backward square leg for one
shortish and beaten for pace, looks to pull and gets hit on the thigh pad. He was cramped for room
half-volley outside off and offers up all the width in the world. Rahane carves it over extra cover. Comfortably lofts it over the in-field with pristine timing
very full, almost a yorker on middle and leg, squeezed out to the midwicket region for one
length ball on off, punched off the front foot to mid-off
short, Rahane swivels around and pull, square leg dives to his right and does well to stop it
short, gets slightly big on him but Rahane pulls with authority. Off the high part of the bat and over deep square leg
could have been caught and bowled. Fullish length, cross-seamer. Rahane pushes forward and sends it uppishly in the direction of Southee who gets his left hand out but cannot reach it
short of a length, outside off, tries to slap it and gets it off the outside part of the bat to square third man region
short of a length, on off, Agarwal arches back and opens the face of his bat to steer it to third man

and he continues to be a trusted wicket-taker for Mumbai. Short of good length, angled across. Agarwal tries to slap it but there is not enough room. Wanted to clear mid-off ut does not get the elevation desired and Rohit takes a fairly simple catch
short of good length, attacking point, punched to point
short, wide, waits for it to come on before cutting late to deep backward point for one
good length, pushed across on off, opens the face of his bat and steers it to backward point
short ball, comes on at  a comfortable height for Smith who fetches a pull from outside off and works it to deep square leg
offers up a lot of width outside off. Smith opens up his arms and cuts but chops it as the ball did not bounce as much as he would have liked
full, on middle and leg, driven straight down the ground and Pollard flings himself full length to his left to save three
length ball, Smith tries to pull but does not find the middle of the bat and drags it wide of mid-on for a single
fullish, angling in on off and middle, Rahane uses his wrists and flicks to midwicket
good length, on off and middle, keeps a bit low and Rahane is slightly late to bring his bat down as he whips it wide of mid-on for one
fuller, outside off, Smith shuffles across and drives square of the wicket, straight to point
good length on off, Smith drops it in front of covers for a quick single

oh, dear! How wide outside off has he fetched that from? Walks across towards off and McClenaghan offers up a harmless length ball. Smith shovels it hard into the cow corner boundary where it seems the ball has painfully hit one of the cheergirls
short of a length, outside off, gets on top of the bounce and stabs it square of the wicket
too short and too wide, Rahane flays it over the backward point region and he has made good enough connection for the ball to go into the crowd
first, there was brute power and now it's deft touch. Again some width on offer outside off. Short of a length and angled across. Hangs back and delicately guides it between keeper and wide slip
full, outside off, tries to drive but does so too hard and mistimes it as the ball goes to mid-on
fullish length, on leg stump, tucks it to midwicket for one
full and straight, driven back in the direction of the bowler who gets his right foot up but cannot stop it
short of a length, outside off, Smith reaches out without feet and carves it off the inside part of the bat towards mid-off
fullish and angling in at pace, Smith uses his wrists and flicks it out to deep square leg
good length, just outside off, punches it off the front foot down the pitch and they take one as mid-on gets around it
full, outside off, Smith goes at a drive with hard hands. He had moved towards off slightly and ends up getting cramped for room. Finds the inside part of the bat
short of good length, outside off, punched crisply off the backfoot to sweeper cover
short and wide outside off, slapped off the backfoot wide of sweeper cover who moves to his right quickly but they get back for two
turn and bounce, wants to whip it away but it turns too much and he is forced to jab it in front
too much width. Can't be offering up so much room, Smith opens up and hammers a cut shot to sweeper cover. This time the fielder has no chance of getting to it
flighted, comes down the track and works it wide of long-on for a brace
on the pads, flicked away to deep midwicket for one
on a length and slightly spinning away, whipped off the backfoot to deep midwicket
short of a length, outside off, coming on nicely for Rahane who punches it to the right of sweeper cover
short ball, gets slightly big on him and Rahane swivels around and pulls it over deep backward square leg. That's fifty for Rahane
short of a length and coming on at pace, Rahane hangs back and opens the face of his bat to run it down to third man for one
short and wide outside off, Smith tries to pull but the ball does not bounce as much and goes off the bottom part of the bat to square leg
short of good length, width on offer, slapped out to sweeper cover for one
arches back to manufacture some room and deftly opens the face of his bat for a single to third man
drifting on the pads, tucked behind to short fine leg

valiant attempt by Pollard but it evades him into the long-on boundary. Rahane comes down the track and chips this one in the air. It seems as though it might be a straightforward catch for long-on, but so good was the timing on that one that it beats Pollard who puts in a full-blooded leap and still cannot get to it. Just sublime timing
full, on the stumps, driven down to long-on for one
Smith sweeps hard and that's a great stop by Hardik Pandya at deep midwicket, runs across to his right and slides full-length to stop it
full, on the pads, gets down and sweeps to deep backward square leg

They have gone upstairs to check this catch. Nitish Rana dives forward to pluck a smart catch. Short ball, Rahane pulls but does so across the line. The ball is dying on the fielder at deep square leg as he gets down and low but has done well. The soft signal was out and it is a clean catch
short and wide, chops the cut to cover
width on offer outside off, Smith reaches out and slaps it to point who slightly misfields allowing the single
too full to cut. Width there but not the right length and the ball beats Stokes' flat-batted shot
full, angling across, driven elegantly through covers and sweeper runs to his left to cut it off. First runs in the IPL for Stokes
full, on the pads, Stokes walks across and clips it away to deep midwicket
short ball, Stokes tries to pull but goes through with his pull early and misses
fullish, outside off, Stokes stabs it square of the wicket for one
full, on the pads, that was the cutter from Bumrah, 114kph, Smith tucks off the pads to deep midwicket for one
short, outside off, comes on at good height and pace at 140kph, Stokes gets on top of the bounce and pulls with authority through midwicket. Beautiful timing and balance
opens the face of his bat but should have probably played it slightly later, gets it just wide of backward point and comes across for a quick single
fuller, outside off, Smith strides forward to meet the pitch and whips it away to the right of long-on for a single
short, outside off, the bounce gets a bit big on Smith and beats his attempted cut
comes forward and backs away early. McClenaghan does well to drag back his length as well as pace and has Smith beaten

walks across outside off early and McClenaghan bangs it in. Smith goes through with a pull shot despite not having all the room he would have liked. But he has hammered this, loses balance as he completes the shot
short of a length and slower in pace, Smith swings hard and chops it towards the keeper
short of good length, angling in, that's a poor line and Smith makes him pay the price. Tucks it off the pads to deep fine leg. Beats short fine leg well

dropped. Nitish Rana the fielder, drops one after taking a good one earlier. Short of a length and angling in so cramping Smith for room. He pulls nonetheless. Rana runs to his right from deep square leg and has it all covered but just cannot hold on to it
lovely placement. It's short of a length and angling in to him. Moves towards off early that enables him to use the angle and just pull it wide of the short fine leg fielder for four
short of a length, just outside off, punched in front of covers for a quick single
slowish and short of a length, punched down to long-off
half-volley outside off and Smith gleefully accepts it before dispatching it over long-on. Swings hard and brings the bottom hand into play as he shovels it into the stands. This is shoddy bowling
short of a length and angling in, chips it in the air as he tucks off the hips. Nobody in square leg
full, rolls his fingers over the seam and tries to take it away from the batsman. But pushes it across too much and it is called a wide
this time, Stokes walks across towards off and punches this to long-off for one
full and wide, mid-off inside the circle and he beats him with a searing drive. Drives away from the body, does not bother moving his feet but it gives him the room to belt it
slower full ball, Stokes picks up the drop in pace and waits for it. Tries to slog it but does not get the timing right and the ball goes on the bounce to deep midwicket

short of a length, outside off, punches it down the ground to the left of long-on and he takes on the fielder there to charge back for the second. Fifty for Smith in his first match as Supergiant captain
good length, outside off, Smith shuffles across and tucks, gets a bat-pad to square leg
fuller ball, pushed straight down the ground for a single
backs away to make room and Southee overcompensates with his line, tries to take it away from Smith and fires it too wide outside off

gives himself room by staying legside of it and tries to shovel it over the off-side in-field. But Southee does well to take it away from him, forces him to reach out and Smith gets beaten comprehensively

full, outside off, Stokes picks it up from outside off and whips it away towards cow corner. Pollard darts across from long-on but cannot get down entirely and the ball goes into the boundary. Pandya is not amused and has his hands up in the air

slower ball from Pandya and Stokes does not pick it. And he also fetches it from way outside off. Tries to slog, the bat face closes in his hand as he completes the shot and he sends it straight down the throat of deep midwicket
length outside off, Smith uses his wrists to flick it to midwicket for one. Turns the strike over to Dhoni and the crowd roars in delight
slightly short but not short enough. Dhoni attempts a pull and drags it down to long-on
width on offer outside off, Smith carves it to the left of point who gets down but does not stop the ball entirely
length, outside off, another attempt at a pull shot but not short enough and Smith knocks it to long-on for one
slower full toss, outside off, Smith flicks it into deep midwicket for one
short of good length, Dhoni jumps across and dabs it through square leg
fullish, whipped off the pads to cow corner, deep midwicket runs to his left and cuts it off in front of the boundary
tries to cut but it does not get up enough and he gets beaten
plays it late and opens the bat face. Backward point makes a diving save but ends up conceding an overthrow with the batsman well inside the crease
lovely shot. Width on offer outside off and Smith makes him pay the price. Opens the bat face really late and comfortably beats short third man
full, outside off, driven straight to mid-off
short of a length, Dhoni swivels around and pulls to deep square leg
short ball, gets up considerably outside off. Smith withdraws his bat and looks for a wide call. But he had moved quite some way outside off
manufactures some room and cuts to point for a single
length, drops it in front of point for a single
length, outside off, Smith lays into a pull shot and the ball screams into the boundary, beats deep midwicket running to his left
short of a length, Dhoni punches it down to long-off for a single
fullish, outside off, whips it away but straight to deep midwicket
goes for a big pull shot but gets cramped for room as it cuts back into him. Bumrah makes a feeble appeal for an lbw, seems like it flicked his back pocket
swing and a miss and the ball goes over the stumps. Back-to-back dots and the pressure back on Pune all of a sudden
like he has been doing for so many years now, Dhoni finds the fence when most needed. Bumrah errs in length and drops it a tad too short and Dhoni pulls with brute force to deep square leg

dropped. Southee spills a sitter at long-on. Full toss from Bumrah and Dhoni does not find the elevation needed. Sends it straight into the hands of Southee who puts it down. Bumrah can't believe his luck
shortish, Dhoni tries to pull and drags it straight down the ground as the ball crashes into the stumps at the non-striker's end
Smith walks across towards off. Pollard bowls it full and Smith whips it away to deep backward square leg where Vinay Kumar tidies up
length ball, Dhoni cannot time this pull shot and the ball is fielded at the deep
is that the game! Smith launches one into the long-on stands and it is a humongous hit. Back of a length, outside off. It was a slower ball and took some serious hitting from Smith who clobbers it
and that is the game. Full, on middle, Smith walks across and flicks it over midwicket. Times it superbly and the ball carries the distance
